SQL.LOAD: SELECT claim_invoice_id, disbursement_id, tax_type_id, tax1_amount, tax1_description, tax2_amount, tax2_description, tax3_amount, tax3_description, tax4_amount, tax4_description, tax5_amount, tax5_description, tax6_amount, tax6_description, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, claim_tax_id FROM elita.elp_claim_tax WHERE claim_tax_id = :claim_tax_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_CLAIM_INVOICE_ID: SELECT claim_invoice_id, disbursement_id, tax_type_id, tax1_amount, tax1_description, tax2_amount, tax2_description, tax3_amount, tax3_description, tax4_amount, tax4_description, tax5_amount, tax5_description, tax6_amount, tax6_description, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, claim_tax_id FROM elita.elp_claim_tax WHERE claim_invoice_id = :claim_invoice_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_CLAIM_INVOICE_ID: select claim_tax_id, claim_invoice_id, disbursement_id, tax_type_id, tax1_amount, tax1_description, tax2_amount, tax2_description, tax3_amount, tax3_description, tax4_amount, tax4_description, tax5_amount, tax5_description, tax6_amount, tax6_description from elita.elp_claim_tax where claim_invoice_id = :claim_invoice_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elita.elp_claim_tax SET claim_invoice_id = :claim_invoice_id, disbursement_id = :disbursement_id, tax_type_id = :tax_type_id, tax1_amount = :tax1_amount, tax1_description = :tax1_description, tax2_amount = :tax2_amount, tax2_description = :tax2_description, tax3_amount = :tax3_amount, tax3_description = :tax3_description, tax4_amount = :tax4_amount, tax4_description = :tax4_description, tax5_amount = :tax5_amount, tax5_description = :tax5_description, tax6_amount = :tax6_amount, tax6_description = :tax6_description, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE claim_tax_id = :claim_tax_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elita.elp_claim_tax ( claim_invoice_id, disbursement_id, tax_type_id, tax1_amount, tax1_description, tax2_amount, tax2_description, tax3_amount, tax3_description, tax4_amount, tax4_description, tax5_amount, tax5_description, tax6_amount, tax6_description, created_by, claim_tax_id ) VALUES ( :claim_invoice_id, :disbursement_id, :tax_type_id, :tax1_amount, :tax1_description, :tax2_amount, :tax2_description, :tax3_amount, :tax3_description, :tax4_amount, :tax4_description, :tax5_amount, :tax5_description, :tax6_amount, :tax6_description, :created_by, :claim_tax_id )
SQL.LOAD_CLAIM_TAX_COUNTRY: SELECT A.COUNTRY_ID FROM ELP_CLAIM C INNER JOIN ELP_SERVICE_CENTER SC ON C.SERVICE_CENTER_ID = SC.SERVICE_CENTER_ID INNER JOIN ELP_ADDRESS A ON A.ADDRESS_ID = SC.ADDRESS_ID WHERE CLAIM_ID = :claim_id
